content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":14048,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/53231707-8353-469a-8568-63c735d87213/Picture21.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/53231707-8353-469a-8568-63c735d87213/Picture21.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture21.png\",\"name\":\"Picture21.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"53231707-8353-469a-8568-63c735d87213\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":601,\"height\":52},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To the right of the Save button is the Workflow option. There are 3 pre-set options of where and how we can deploy our page / post / other depending upon your user permissions. Deploying to ‘Dev’ is the lowest progression option on the way to making pages and changes live. You can add more options if you need them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":37953,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/739138a3-ae13-40ed-b3ef-b166819e975e/Picture22.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/739138a3-ae13-40ed-b3ef-b166819e975e/Picture22.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture22.png\",\"name\":\"Picture22.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"739138a3-ae13-40ed-b3ef-b166819e975e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":720,\"height\":490},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clicking the workflow dropdown lets you choose where to move a page in the workflow. Clicking ‘deploy to dev’ will push the page to the dev step of the workflow. You can see the progress of this in the activity monitor dropdown.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":21720,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/639e6c71-cf19-441b-81c5-a9bc26d95a75/Picture23.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/639e6c71-cf19-441b-81c5-a9bc26d95a75/Picture23.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture23.png\",\"name\":\"Picture23.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"639e6c71-cf19-441b-81c5-a9bc26d95a75\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":385,\"height\":126.00000000000001},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The other way to access workflow is to right click on our page/post in the Content Tree. Notice that when you access the workflow menu, there is an option to ‘Include Dependencies’. This will control whether dependent aspects of your page will be published as we publish our page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":63851,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bebe4c16-49b7-4c0d-a558-039d5d75d4e2/Picture24.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bebe4c16-49b7-4c0d-a558-039d5d75d4e2/Picture24.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture24.png\",\"name\":\"Picture24.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bebe4c16-49b7-4c0d-a558-039d5d75d4e2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":410,\"height\":591},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We’ll notice that when the page is published, our asset’s page name will be added to the url. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":40174,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/443b04b3-1df8-495c-8991-ed01ebb81573/Picture25 (2).png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/443b04b3-1df8-495c-8991-ed01ebb81573/Picture25 (2).png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture25 (2).png\",\"name\":\"Picture25 (2).png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"443b04b3-1df8-495c-8991-ed01ebb81573\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":709,\"height\":84},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Publishing content to dev level will allow content to be publicly accessible. You can stop it being picked up by web crawlers but it can still be accessed with the URL.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A new option will show on this dropdown once done.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":15315,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d9b6bf5-9af7-42eb-bfc6-56d0e18ae7bd/Picture26.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9d9b6bf5-9af7-42eb-bfc6-56d0e18ae7bd/Picture26.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture26.png\",\"name\":\"Picture26.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9d9b6bf5-9af7-42eb-bfc6-56d0e18ae7bd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":339,\"height\":165},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clicking ‘Training Dev’ takes you to the live page in the dev area. The start of the URL indicates this.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":109843,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/182f9751-8557-4735-be09-9db182b6035e/Picture27.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/182f9751-8557-4735-be09-9db182b6035e/Picture27.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture27.png\",\"name\":\"Picture27.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"182f9751-8557-4735-be09-9db182b6035e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":601,\"height\":315},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Edits in ‘stage’ level will automatically update the page within Dev or any lower environments configured in your Crownpeak DXM instance i.e dev and pending. Edits in a higher state are deployed to all lower levels unless a branch has been created (see next).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
